Package bus

Class Validator

java.lang.Object
bus.Validator
public class Validator extends Object
Validates the user inputs and manages the exceptions thrown when an error occurs during the execution of the application.
Version:
2021-12-14
Author:
Lilas Guan

    • isInRange

      public static boolean isInRange​(int value) throws RaiseException
      Verifies if the value is positive. The value is valid if positive, else it's an invalid value.
      Parameters:
      value - the value int to validate.
      Returns:
      true if the value is positive, else throws RaiseException
      Throws:
      RaiseException - if the argument is negative or 0.
      See Also:
      RaiseException

    • isDigit

      public static boolean isDigit​(String value) throws RaiseException
      Verifies if the string contains only digits. Otherwise, it's an invalid input.
      Parameters:
      value - the string to validate.
      Returns:
      true if the value has only digits, else throws RaiseException
      Throws:
      RaiseException - if the string does not contain only digits.
      See Also:
      RaiseException, Character

    • isDate

      public static Date isDate​(String value) throws RaiseException
      Verifies if the string is a date with the defined format. Otherwise, it's an invalid input.
      Parameters:
      value - the string to validate.
      Returns:
      a Date if value is valid
      Throws:
      RaiseException - if the date format is invalid.
      See Also:
      RaiseException, Date, SimpleDateFormat, ParseException

    • isNotDuplicateDB

      public static Long isNotDuplicateDB​(Long value) throws SQLException, RaiseException
      Verifies if the serial number of the Vehicle to add in the appropriate database doesn't exist in the database. Otherwise, it's an invalid input.
      Parameters:
      value - the Long to validate.
      Returns:
      a Long if value is valid
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error or other errors related happens during the execution of the application.
      RaiseException - if the value matches a serial number in the database.
      See Also:
      Vehicle.getSerialNumber(), GasVehicle.search(Long), GasVehicle.getData(), ElectricVehicle.search(Long), ElectricVehicle.getData(), RaiseException, SQLException

    • isNotDuplicate

      public static Long isNotDuplicate​(Long value) throws RaiseException
      Verifies if the serial number of the Vehicle to add doesn't exist in the SingletonVehiclesFleet's fleetOfVehicles. Otherwise, it's an invalid input.
      Parameters:
      value - the Long to validate.
      Returns:
      a Long if value is valid
      Throws:
      RaiseException - if the value matches a serial number in the list.
      See Also:
      SingletonVehiclesFleet.search(Long), RaiseException

    • isNotDuplicateHM

      public static Long isNotDuplicateHM​(Long value) throws RaiseException
      Verifies if the serial number of the Vehicle to add doesn't exist in the SingletonHashMapCollection's vehicleCollection. Otherwise, it's an invalid input.
      Parameters:
      value - the Long to validate.
      Returns:
      a Long if value is valid
      Throws:
      RaiseException - if the value matches a serial number in the list.
      See Also:
      SingletonHashMapCollection.getVehicleList(), RaiseException
